defs.docs:
`font-kit` provides a common interface to the various system font libraries and provides
 services such as finding fonts on the system, performing nearest-font matching, and rasterizing
 glyphs.

defs.name: canvas
defs.docs: An in-memory bitmap surface for glyph rasterization.

defs.name: Canvas
defs.docs: An in-memory bitmap surface for glyph rasterization.

defs.name: pixels
defs.docs: The raw pixel data.

defs.name: size
defs.docs: The size of the buffer, in pixels.

defs.name: stride
defs.docs: The number of *bytes* between successive rows.

defs.name: format
defs.docs: The image format of the canvas.

defs.name: new
defs.docs: Creates a new blank canvas with the given pixel size and format.

defs.name: with_stride
defs.value: fn (size: &Size2D<u32>, stride: usize, format: Format) -> Canvas
defs.docs:
Creates a new blank canvas with the given pixel size, stride (number of bytes between
 successive rows), and format.

defs.name: Rgba32
defs.docs: Premultiplied R8G8B8A8, little-endian.

defs.name: Rgb24
defs.docs: R8G8B8, little-endian.

defs.name: Format
defs.docs: The image format for the canvas.

defs.name: bits_per_pixel
defs.docs: Returns the number of bits per pixel that this image format corresponds to.

defs.name: components_per_pixel
defs.docs: Returns the number of color channels per pixel that this image format corresponds to.

defs.name: bits_per_component
defs.docs: Returns the number of bits per color channel that this image format contains.

defs.name: bytes_per_pixel
defs.docs: Returns the number of bytes per pixel that this image format corresponds to.

defs.name: Bilevel
defs.docs: "Black-and-white" rendering. Each pixel is either entirely on or off.

defs.name: GrayscaleAa
defs.docs: Grayscale antialiasing. Only one channel is used.

defs.name: SubpixelAa
defs.docs: Subpixel RGB antialiasing, for LCD screens.

defs.name: RasterizationOptions
defs.docs: The antialiasing strategy that should be used when rasterizing glyphs.

defs.name: error
defs.docs: Various types of errors that `font-kit` can return.

defs.name: UnknownFormat
defs.docs: The data was of a format the loader didn't recognize.

defs.name: NoSuchFontInCollection
defs.docs: Attempted to load an invalid index in a TrueType or OpenType font collection.

defs.name: Parse
defs.docs: Attempted to load a malformed or corrupted font.

defs.name: NoFilesystem
defs.docs:
Attempted to load a font from the filesystem, but there is no filesystem (e.g. in
 WebAssembly).

defs.name: Io
defs.docs: A disk or similar I/O error occurred while attempting to load the font.

defs.name: FontLoadingError
defs.docs: Reasons why a loader might fail to load a font.

defs.name: NoSuchGlyph
defs.docs: The font didn't contain a glyph with that ID.

defs.name: PlatformError
defs.docs: A platform function returned an error.

defs.name: GlyphLoadingError
defs.docs: Reasons why a font might fail to load a glyph.

defs.name: NotFound
defs.docs: No font matching the given query was found.

defs.name: CannotAccessSource
defs.docs: The source was inaccessible because of an I/O or similar error.

defs.name: SelectionError
defs.docs: Reasons why a source might fail to look up a font or fonts.

defs.name: family
defs.docs: Defines a set of faces that vary in weight, width or slope.

defs.name: Family
defs.docs: Defines a set of faces that vary in weight, width or slope.

defs.name: fonts
defs.docs: Returns the individual fonts in this family.

defs.name: is_empty
defs.docs: Returns true if and only if this family is empty.

defs.name: family_handle
defs.docs: Encapsulates the information needed to locate and open the fonts in a family.

defs.name: FamilyHandle
defs.docs: Encapsulates the information needed to locate and open the fonts in a family.

defs.name: new
defs.docs: Creates an empty set of family handles.

defs.name: from_font_handles
defs.docs: Creates a set of font family handles.

defs.name: push
defs.docs: Adds a new handle to this set.

defs.name: is_empty
defs.docs: Returns true if and only if this set has no fonts in it.

defs.name: fonts
defs.docs: Returns all the handles in this set.

defs.name: family_name
defs.docs: A possible value for the `font-family` CSS property.

defs.name: Title
defs.docs: A specific font family, specified by name: e.g. "Arial", "times".

defs.name: Serif
defs.docs: Serif fonts represent the formal text style for a script.

defs.name: SansSerif
defs.docs:
Glyphs in sans-serif fonts, as the term is used in CSS, are generally low contrast
 (vertical and horizontal stems have the close to the same thickness) and have stroke
 endings that are plain â€” without any flaring, cross stroke, or other ornamentation.

defs.name: Monospace
defs.docs: The sole criterion of a monospace font is that all glyphs have the same fixed width.

defs.name: Cursive
defs.docs:
Glyphs in cursive fonts generally use a more informal script style, and the result looks
 more like handwritten pen or brush writing than printed letterwork.

defs.name: Fantasy
defs.docs:
Fantasy fonts are primarily decorative or expressive fonts that contain decorative or
 expressive representations of characters.

defs.name: FamilyName
defs.value: FamilyName::{Title, Serif, SansSerif, Monospace, Cursive, Fantasy}
defs.docs: A possible value for the `font-family` CSS property.

defs.name: file_type
defs.docs: The type of a font file: either a single font or a TrueType/OpenType collection.

defs.name: Single
defs.docs: The font file represents a single font (`.ttf`, `.otf`, `.woff`, etc.)

defs.name: Collection
defs.docs: The font file represents a collection of fonts (`.ttc`, `.otc`, etc.)

defs.name: FileType
defs.docs: The type of a font file: either a single font or a TrueType/OpenType collection.

defs.name: font
defs.docs: A font face loaded into memory.

defs.name: handle
defs.docs: Encapsulates the information needed to locate and open a font.

defs.name: Path
defs.docs: A font on disk referenced by a path.

defs.name: Memory
defs.docs: A font in memory.

defs.name: Handle
defs.docs: Encapsulates the information needed to locate and open a font.

defs.name: from_path
defs.docs: Creates a new handle from a path.

defs.name: from_memory
defs.docs: Creates a new handle from raw TTF/OTF/etc. data in memory.

defs.name: load
defs.docs: A convenience method to load this handle with the default loader, producing a Font.

defs.name: hinting
defs.docs: Specifies how hinting (grid fitting) is to be performed (or not performed) for a glyph.

defs.name: None
defs.docs: No hinting is performed unless absolutely necessary to assemble the glyph.

defs.name: Vertical
defs.docs:
Hinting is performed only in the vertical direction. The specified point size is used for
 grid fitting.

defs.name: VerticalSubpixel
defs.docs:
Hinting is performed only in the vertical direction, and further tweaks are applied to make
 subpixel antialiasing look better. The specified point size is used for grid fitting.

defs.name: Full
defs.docs:
Hinting is performed in both horizontal and vertical directions. The specified point size
 is used for grid fitting.

defs.name: HintingOptions
defs.docs: Specifies how hinting (grid fitting) is to be performed (or not performed) for a glyph.

defs.name: grid_fitting_size
defs.docs: Returns the point size that will be used for grid fitting, if any.

defs.name: loader
defs.docs:
Provides a common interface to the platform-specific API that loads, parses, and rasterizes
 fonts.

defs.name: FontTransform
defs.docs: The transform that glyphs will be transformed by.

defs.name: scale_x
defs.docs: Scale in the x direction

defs.name: skew_x
defs.docs: Skew in the x direction

defs.name: skew_y
defs.docs: Skew in the y direction

defs.name: scale_y
defs.docs: Scale in the y direction

defs.name: new
defs.value: fn (scale_x: f32, skew_x: f32, skew_y: f32, scale_y: f32) -> Self
defs.docs: Initializes a FontTransform to the provided values

defs.name: identity
defs.docs: Initializes a FontTransform to the identity transform

defs.name: Loader
defs.docs:
Provides a common interface to the platform-specific API that loads, parses, and rasterizes
 fonts.

defs.name: NativeFont
defs.docs: The handle that the API natively uses to represent a font.

defs.name: from_bytes
defs.value: fn (font_data: Arc<Vec<u8>>, font_index: u32) -> Result<Self, FontLoadingError>
defs.docs: Loads a font from raw font data (the contents of a `.ttf`/`.otf`/etc. file).

defs.name: from_file
defs.value: fn (file: &mut File, font_index: u32) -> Result<Self, FontLoadingError>
defs.docs: Loads a font from a `.ttf`/`.otf`/etc. file.

defs.name: from_path
defs.value:
fn

(path: P, font_index: u32) -> Result
defs.docs: Loads a font from the path to a `.ttf`/`.otf`/etc. file.

defs.name: from_native_font
defs.docs: Creates a font from a native API handle.

defs.name: from_handle
defs.docs: Loads the font pointed to by a handle.

defs.name: analyze_bytes
defs.docs:
Determines whether a blob of raw font data represents a supported font, and, if so, what
 type of font it is.

defs.name: analyze_file
defs.docs: Determines whether a file represents a supported font, and, if so, what type of font it is.

defs.name: analyze_path
defs.docs: Determines whether a path points to a supported font, and, if so, what type of font it is.

defs.name: native_font
defs.docs: Returns the wrapped native font handle.

defs.name: postscript_name
defs.docs: Returns the PostScript name of the font. This should be globally unique.

defs.name: full_name
defs.docs: Returns the full name of the font (also known as "display name" on macOS).

defs.name: family_name
defs.docs: Returns the name of the font family.

defs.name: is_monospace
defs.docs: Returns true if and only if the font is monospace (fixed-width).

defs.name: properties
defs.docs: Returns the values of various font properties, corresponding to those defined in CSS.

defs.name: glyph_count
defs.docs: Returns the number of glyphs in the font.

defs.name: glyph_for_char
defs.docs: Returns the usual glyph ID for a Unicode character.

defs.name: glyph_by_name
defs.docs: Returns the glyph ID for the specified glyph name.

defs.name: outline
defs.value: fn <B> (&self, glyph_id: u32, hinting_mode: HintingOptions, path_builder: &mut B) -> Result<(), GlyphLoadingError>
defs.docs: Sends the vector path for a glyph to a path builder.

defs.name: typographic_bounds
defs.docs: Returns the boundaries of a glyph in font units.

defs.name: advance
defs.docs:
Returns the distance from the origin of the glyph with the given ID to the next, in font
 units.

defs.name: origin
defs.docs: Returns the amount that the given glyph should be displaced from the origin.

defs.name: metrics
defs.docs: Retrieves various metrics that apply to the entire font.

defs.name: handle
defs.docs: Returns a handle to this font, if possible.

defs.name: copy_font_data
defs.docs: Attempts to return the raw font data (contents of the font file).

defs.name: supports_hinting_options
defs.value: fn (&self, hinting_options: HintingOptions, for_rasterization: bool) -> bool
defs.docs: Returns true if and only if the font loader can perform hinting in the requested way.

defs.name: raster_bounds
defs.value: fn (&self, glyph_id: u32, point_size: f32, transform: &FontTransform, origin: &Point2D<f32>, _: HintingOptions, _: RasterizationOptions) -> Result<Rect<i32>, GlyphLoadingError>
defs.docs:
Returns the pixel boundaries that the glyph will take up when rendered using this loader's
 rasterizer at the given `point_size`, `transform` and `origin`. `origin` is not transformed
 by `transform`.

defs.name: rasterize_glyph
defs.value: fn (&self, canvas: &mut Canvas, glyph_id: u32, point_size: f32, transform: &FontTransform, origin: &Point2D<f32>, hinting_options: HintingOptions, rasterization_options: RasterizationOptions) -> Result<(), GlyphLoadingError>
defs.docs: Rasterizes a glyph to a canvas with the given size and origin.

defs.name: get_fallbacks
defs.docs: Get font fallback results for the given text and locale.

defs.name: FallbackResult
defs.docs: The result of a fallback query.

defs.name: fonts
defs.docs: A list of fallback fonts.

defs.name: valid_len
defs.docs: The fallback list is valid for this slice of the given text.

defs.name: FallbackFont
defs.docs: A single font record for a fallback query result.

defs.name: font
defs.docs: The font.

defs.name: scale
defs.docs: A scale factor that should be applied to the fallback font.

defs.name: loaders
defs.docs: The different system services that can load and rasterize fonts.

defs.name: directwrite
defs.docs: A loader that uses the Windows DirectWrite API to load and rasterize fonts.

defs.name: NativeFont
defs.docs: DirectWrite's representation of a font.

defs.name: dwrite_font
defs.docs: The native DirectWrite font object.

defs.name: dwrite_font_face
defs.docs: The native DirectWrite font face object.

defs.name: Font
defs.docs: A loader that uses the Windows DirectWrite API to load and rasterize fonts.

defs.name: from_bytes
defs.value: fn (font_data: Arc<Vec<u8>>, font_index: u32) -> Result<Font, FontLoadingError>
defs.docs: Loads a font from raw font data (the contents of a `.ttf`/`.otf`/etc. file).

defs.value: fn (file: &mut File, font_index: u32) -> Result<Font, FontLoadingError>
defs.docs: Loads a font from a `.ttf`/`.otf`/etc. file.

fn

(path: P, font_index: u32) -> Result

defs.docs: Returns true if and only if the font is monospace (fixed-width).

defs.docs: Returns the boundaries of a glyph in font units.

Returns the distance from the origin of the glyph with the given ID to the next, in font
 units.

defs.docs: Retrieves various metrics that apply to the entire font.

defs.docs: Returns a handle to this font, if possible.

defs.name: raster_bounds
defs.value: fn (&self, glyph_id: u32, point_size: f32, transform: &FontTransform, origin: &Point2D<f32>, hinting_options: HintingOptions, rasterization_options: RasterizationOptions) -> Result<Rect<i32>, GlyphLoadingError>
defs.docs:
Returns the pixel boundaries that the glyph will take up when rendered using this loader's
 rasterizer at the given size and origin.

defs.name: rasterize_glyph
defs.value: fn (&self, canvas: &mut Canvas, glyph_id: u32, point_size: f32, transform: &FontTransform, origin: &Point2D<f32>, hinting_options: HintingOptions, rasterization_options: RasterizationOptions) -> Result<(), GlyphLoadingError>

defs.name: supports_hinting_options
defs.value: fn (&self, hinting_options: HintingOptions, for_rasterization: bool) -> bool
defs.docs: Returns true if and only if the font loader can perform hinting in the requested way.

defs.name: metrics
defs.docs: Various metrics that apply to the entire font.

defs.name: Metrics
defs.value: Metrics { units_per_em, ascent, descent, line_gap, underline_position, underline_thickness, cap_height, x_height }
defs.docs: Various metrics that apply to the entire font.

defs.name: units_per_em
defs.docs: The number of font units per em.

defs.name: ascent
defs.docs: The maximum amount the font rises above the baseline, in font units.

defs.name: descent
defs.docs: The maximum amount the font descends below the baseline, in font units.

defs.name: line_gap
defs.docs: Distance between baselines, in font units.

defs.name: underline_position
defs.docs:
The suggested distance of the top of the underline from the baseline (negative values
 indicate below baseline), in font units.

defs.name: underline_thickness
defs.docs: A suggested value for the underline thickness, in font units.

defs.name: cap_height
defs.docs: The approximate amount that uppercase letters rise above the baseline, in font units.

defs.name: x_height
defs.docs:
The approximate amount that non-ascending lowercase letters rise above the baseline, in
 font units.

defs.name: properties
defs.docs: Properties that specify which font in a family to use: e.g. style, weight, and stretchiness.

defs.name: Properties
defs.docs: Properties that specify which font in a family to use: e.g. style, weight, and stretchiness.

defs.name: style
defs.docs: The font style, as defined in CSS.

defs.name: weight
defs.docs: The font weight, as defined in CSS.

defs.name: stretch
defs.docs: The font stretchiness, as defined in CSS.

defs.name: new
defs.docs:
Initializes a property set to its default values: normal style, normal weight, and normal
 stretchiness.

defs.name: style
defs.docs: Sets the value of the style property and returns this property set for method chaining.

defs.name: weight
defs.docs: Sets the value of the weight property and returns this property set for method chaining.

defs.name: stretch
defs.docs: Sets the value of the stretch property and returns this property set for method chaining.

defs.name: Normal
defs.docs: A face that is neither italic not obliqued.

defs.name: Italic
defs.docs: A form that is generally cursive in nature.

defs.name: Oblique
defs.docs: A typically-sloped version of the regular face.

defs.name: Style
defs.docs: Allows italic or oblique faces to be selected.

defs.name: Weight
defs.docs:
The degree of blackness or stroke thickness of a font. This value ranges from 100.0 to 900.0,
 with 400.0 as normal.

defs.name: THIN
defs.docs: Thin weight (100), the thinnest value.

defs.name: EXTRA_LIGHT
defs.docs: Extra light weight (200).

defs.name: LIGHT
defs.docs: Light weight (300).

defs.name: NORMAL
defs.docs: Normal (400).

defs.name: MEDIUM
defs.docs: Medium weight (500, higher than normal).

defs.name: SEMIBOLD
defs.docs: Semibold weight (600).

defs.name: BOLD
defs.docs: Bold weight (700).

defs.name: EXTRA_BOLD
defs.docs: Extra-bold weight (800).

defs.name: BLACK
defs.docs: Black weight (900), the thickest value.

defs.name: Stretch
defs.docs: The width of a font as an approximate fraction of the normal width.

defs.name: ULTRA_CONDENSED
defs.docs: Ultra-condensed width (50%), the narrowest possible.

defs.name: EXTRA_CONDENSED
defs.docs: Extra-condensed width (62.5%).

defs.name: CONDENSED
defs.docs: Condensed width (75%).

defs.name: SEMI_CONDENSED
defs.docs: Semi-condensed width (87.5%).

defs.name: NORMAL
defs.docs: Normal width (100%).

defs.name: SEMI_EXPANDED
defs.docs: Semi-expanded width (112.5%).

defs.name: EXPANDED
defs.docs: Expanded width (125%).

defs.name: EXTRA_EXPANDED
defs.docs: Extra-expanded width (150%).

defs.name: ULTRA_EXPANDED
defs.docs: Ultra-expanded width (200%), the widest possible.

defs.name: source
defs.docs: A database of installed fonts that can be queried.

defs.name: Source
defs.docs: A database of installed fonts that can be queried.

defs.name: all_fonts
defs.docs: Returns paths of all fonts installed on the system.

defs.name: all_families
defs.docs: Returns the names of all families installed on the system.

defs.name: select_family_by_name
defs.docs: Looks up a font family by name and returns the handles of all the fonts in that family.

defs.name: select_by_postscript_name
defs.docs: Selects a font by PostScript name, which should be a unique identifier.

defs.name: select_best_match
defs.docs:
Performs font matching according to the CSS Fonts Level 3 specification and returns the
 handle.

defs.name: sources
defs.docs: Various databases of installed fonts that can be queried.

defs.name: directwrite
defs.docs: A source that contains the installed fonts on Windows.

defs.name: DirectWriteSource
defs.docs: A source that contains the installed fonts on Windows.

defs.name: new
defs.docs: Opens the system font collection.

defs.name: all_fonts
defs.docs: Returns paths of all fonts installed on the system.

defs.name: all_families

defs.docs: Looks up a font family by name and returns the handles of all the fonts in that family.

defs.name: select_best_match

Performs font matching according to the CSS Fonts Level 3 specification and returns the

defs.docs: A source that loads fonts from a directory or directories on disk.

defs.name: FsSource
defs.docs: A source that loads fonts from a directory or directories on disk.

defs.docs: Opens the default set of directories on this platform and indexes the fonts found within.

defs.docs: Returns paths of all fonts installed on the system.

defs.docs: Looks up a font family by name and returns the handles of all the fonts in that family.

defs.name: select_best_match

Performs font matching according to the CSS Fonts Level 3 specification and returns the
 handle.

defs.docs: A source that keeps fonts in memory.

defs.docs: A source that keeps fonts in memory.

defs.name: from_fonts
defs.docs: Creates a new memory source that contains the given set of font handles.

defs.name: all_fonts
defs.docs: Returns paths of all fonts installed on the system.

defs.name: all_families

defs.name: select_family_by_name
defs.docs: Looks up a font family by name and returns the handles of all the fonts in that family.

defs.name: select_best_match

Performs font matching according to the CSS Fonts Level 3 specification and returns the
 handle.

defs.docs: A source that encapsulates multiple sources and allows them to be queried as a group.

defs.docs: Creates a new source that contains all the fonts in the supplied sources.
